stanza.line: That god forbid that made me first your slaveslave

Being your vassal bound to stay your leisureleisure
O let me suffer (being at your beck)beck)
Th imprisoned absence of your libertyliberty
And patience tame to sufferance bide each checkcheck
Be where you list your charter is so strongstrong
That you your self may privilage your timetime
To what you will to you it doth belongbelong
Your self to pardon of self-doing crimecrime
